PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04882022-05-15,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of KONRAD SIOUI of Wendake, Quebec, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
